General.Name: Mercantil do Brasil Financeira S.A
General.Description: Creditaqui Financeira S.A. - Crédito, Financiamento e Investimento provides direct consumer credit and payroll credit services in Brazil. The company was founded in 1943 and is headquartered in Belo Horizonte, Brazil. Creditaqui Financeira S.A. - Crédito, Financiamento e Investimento is a subsidiary of Banco Mercantil do Brasil S.A.
General.Address: Rua Rio de Janeiro, nº 654, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil, 30160-912
